episodes.title: John Sweeney Speaks at FLAG Down 2014
episodes.description: BBC journalist John Sweeney speaks on the last day of FLAG Down 2014, in Clearwater Florida.

episodes.title: Chris Shelton - Flag Down 2014
episodes.description:
Chris Shelton spent 27 years working for the Church, as Class V Org staff at first, before becoming a Sea Organization member. He spent many years at continental management, and later executed many missions and projects for Ideal Orgs. Chris also worked at Bridge Publications and the Advanced Org of Los Angeles. Shelton also spent time in the Sea Organization's brutal Rehabilitation Project Force.

After seeing firsthand that Scientology's programs and actions were all about making money and not spiritual freedom, Shelton decided to leave the Sea Org a year ago. He was harassed and intimidated into keeping quiet, and quickly found out the full truth about the organization to which he had devoted his life. He publicly spoke out against it and as a result, lost his fiancé, many long-time friends, and was also declared a "Suppressive Person". Despite these losses, Chris continues to speak out against the Scientology's abuses.

Recorded at Flag Down 2014 - Exposing the fraud and abuse of the Scientology cult

episodes.title: Jamie DeWolf - Flag Down 2014
episodes.description:
Jamie is a 'slam poet' and the great grandson of the founder of Scientology, L. Ron Hubbard. To say that Jamie has things to say about his great grandfather would be an understatement. Jamie's grandfather, Ronald DeWolf, helped build Hubbard's Scientology empire in the 1950s but later denounced him as a "fraud."

Jamie's mother and ex-girlfriend have been visited by Scientology agents asking about his references to Scientology in his poetry. As he put in his own words -- "In high school, a psychiatrist asked me if I had a history of mental illness in my family. I had to say...YES!"

Recorded at Flag Down 2014 - Exposing the fraud and abuse of the Scientology cult

episodes.title: Mark Bunker - Flag Down 2014
episodes.description: Recorded at Flag Down 2014 - Exposing the fraud and abuse of the Scientology cult

episodes.title: Ishmael Bey - Flag Down 2014
episodes.description:
Ishmael Bey is a community activist and an investigative researcher. Ishmael spent over a decade within the Nation of Islam moving up to the officer ranks to Assistant Minister. He was the first to bring national attention to the recent Church of Scientology's recent assimilation of the Nation of Islam.

Ishmael's work has been highlighted in national magazines along with his DVDs and radio interviews. Ishmael runs the "Scientology Invasion of The Black Community" Facebook group, and is also working on a documentary concerning Scientology's relationship with African-Americans.

Recorded at Flag Down 2014 - Exposing the fraud and abuse of the Scientology cult

episodes.title: Marisa Sigmond - Flag Down 2014
episodes.description: Recorded at Flag Down 2014 - Exposing the fraud and abuse of the Scientology cult

episodes.title: John Duignan - Flag Down 2014
episodes.description:
"Walking down a street in Stuttgart I never imagined I'd lose the next 22 years of my life" says John.

While in the Sea Organisation, John worked 16-hours days for between $8 and $24 dollars a week. When he left the organisation in 2006 at the age of 42, he described himself as feeling "hopelessly suicidal" - a "ghost" with no money, no qualifications or transferrable skills, no state entitlements and no way of relating to "wogs" (non-Scientologists).

John has written a book called "The Complex", in which he describes his two decades within the organisation.

For the first time ever, a former high-ranking member of the Church of Scientology is lifting the lid on life inside the worlds fastest growing cult. The Complex reveals the true story behind the religion that has ensnared a who's who list of celebrities such as Tom Cruise and John Travolta, and convinced thousands of ordinary people to join up.

Duignan describes how two years ago he staged a dramatic escape from the elite paramilitary group at the core of the Church, the Sea Organisation, and how he narrowly evaded pursuit by Scientologists from the Office of Special Affairs. He looks back on the 22 years he served in the Church s secret army and describes the hours of sleep deprivation, brain-washing and intense auditing or religious counselling he endured, as he was moulded into a soldier of Scientology. He talks about the money-making-machine at the heart of the Church, the Scientology goal to Clear the Planet and Get Ethics In , the training programmes, the Rehabilitation Project Force and the punishments meted out to anyone who transgresses, including children. We follow his journey through the Church and the painful investigation that leads to his eventual realisation that there is something very wrong at Scientology s core.

The beliefs of the Church of Scientology might sound like something from a science fiction book but The Complex reveals that the Church's growing power base is a shocking reality.

http://www.ebay.com/usr/spedrofcuk

Recorded at Flag Down 2014 - Exposing the fraud and abuse of the Scientology cult

episodes.title: Michael Leonard Tilse - Flag Down 2014
episodes.description:
Michael Leonard Tilse joined the Scientology organisation in 1975 in San Francisco, and soon joined staff, and then the Sea Organization. He quit in 2003, and is now a strong critic willing to tell his story, and help others to wake up to Scientology's con.

Recorded at Flag Down 2014 - Exposing the fraud and abuse of the Scientology cult.

episodes.title: Russell Miller - Flag Down 2014
episodes.description:
Russell Miller is an award-winning journalist based in Britain whose work has appeared throughout the world. He is the author of 15 acclaimed books, including "Bare-faced Messiah: The True Story of L. Ron Hubbard". He has only been sued once -- by the Church of Scientology. While researching the book in the United States, Miller was spied upon. His friends and business associates also received visits from Scientologists and private detectives. Attempts were made to frame him for the murder of a London private detective, the murder of American singer Dean Reed in East Berlin and a fire in an aircraft factory.

Recorded at Flag Down 2014 - Exposing the fraud and abuse of the Scientology cult
